file_content.text: You found us, Commander. Aren't you a clever one?
I knew you would come. Your kind are smug and predictable.
Doesn't mean we can't be hospitable. Tell us, Commander... how would you like to die?
You have friends on those bases we destroyed? Loved ones? Loss is a terrible thing.
They were weak. Vermin must be stamped out!
Such a shame, Commander. You have so much power and not a clue what to do with it.
Your Alliance is made of filth. It will fall--and so will you!
I'm afraid Lord Anril's right. It's almost time for you to say goodbye.
Don't worry, we'll make your end nice and quick.
I've discovered a dangerous rogue faction within Sith Intelligence, led by a former Imperial Cipher and a powerful Sith Lord.
Major Korven and Lord Anril are launching devastating attacks on Alliance settlements. By striking us, they're attempting to reclaim the glory days of the Sith Empire.
We've tracked their operations to Vanguard Station. Board the facility and end this threat.
Impressive, Commander. By cutting off the head of this rogue faction, you've put an end to their attacks on our outposts.
Our Alliance is stronger with Anril and Korven pulverized and Vanguard Station out of play.
Wiping out these traitors is a powerful reminder to the galaxy that we do not tolerate threats.
Excellent job, Commander. Our allies can breathe safely knowing they're no longer the target of lunatics.
With Lord Anril and Major Korven out of the picture, we can once again rally others to our cause.
You proved today that we protect our own. The galaxy won't soon forget this.
